about.title: About
about.bio1: Backend and AI systems builder. I work on event-driven architectures, distributed systems, and AI-enabled applications. Most of my work involves making systems that are reliable at scale — Kafka pipelines, caching layers, and the infrastructure that holds everything together.
about.bio2: I document what I build because engineering work is often invisible. This site is a living record of problems I've solved, decisions I've made, and things I'm still figuring out.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Interested in working together or have a question? Reach out.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Systems I'm actively building, iterating on, or have paused.
projects.iteratingDescription: Refining based on feedback or new requirements.

repos.title: Repositories
repos.description: Curated list of repositories — not a dump, but context for why each exists.

notes.title: Engineering Notes & Open-Source Work
notes.description: Public engineering notes derived directly from active repositories and projects.
